text: can't rearrange the module inside flexible column on the Edit Page section ... this is to be solved by reloading the page ... but now that does't cut it anymore :disappointed:

Yup, we just did that for this time. Hope they fix it soon...
BUG?: here's a screen recording ... chrome and safari: <https://soapbox.wistia.com/videos/xQvsYimsqO>
in <#C22PU4LV8|general> there’s an ongoing convo about this they’re working on it

The ability to add dots "." in file names and folder in the new DM. Currently only letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores are allowed. It would be great for organizing/versioning when making small updates. Example: Theme-2.1.3 (currently we can only add Theme-2_1_3 or Theme-2-1-3 or Theme-213, which is not the standard and not pretty). That would be great!
Thanks Jeff - In attempting to use the list_memberships we would have to go and hard-code the ID of the list then? I don’t see anything like a name of the list on the object
